text:
@davidaxelrod You know why. 
The freaking Teaparty has taken over the White House. 
A pandemic will crush the healthcare system and that's why they were elected, to kill it.
Is the entire "freedom caucus" working in the WH?
Trump's just there for the money and the epic brown nosing.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
